backend/main.mo: Actor implementing item, branding, user profile, basket, and access-controlled operations with persistent maps and storage/authorization mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence metadata linking a specific bulk-upload verification feature to related frontend files, components, and tests.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of all major frontend files describing their roles in UI, routing, hooks, and admin features.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base file defining OKLCH theme tokens, dark mode values, and global background/foreground styles.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML scaffold mounting the React app and loading the main entry script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main router and layout component configuring header, footer, profile dialog, and all route definitions.
frontend/src/components/AccessDeniedScre: UI screen that informs users they lack admin permissions and offers a button back to the storefront.
Admin editor allowing description updates and image replacement for an item with validation and toast feedback.
frontend/src/components/AdminPublishTogg: Admin control to publish or unpublish an item using mutations with loading states and toast notifications.
frontend/src/components/ItemCard.tsx: Displays an item card with image, title, description, price, and sold badge, navigating to the item page on click.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Handles Internet Identity login/logout and shows admin or user actions based on authentication and admin status.
frontend/src/components/Model3DViewer.ts: Renders a 3D model using Three.js with fallback and error handling inside a React Suspense canvas.
frontend/src/components/PriceEditor.tsx: Provides a UI to edit and save an item's price, validating input and updating via mutation.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupDial: Shows a dialog prompting new authenticated users to enter their name and save their profile.
frontend/src/components/StorefrontHeroMe: Displays hero media as either a 3D model or background image along with customizable title and subtitle.
frontend/src/components/StripeSetup.tsx: Dialog for configuring Stripe with a secret key and allowed countries, saving via mutation.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor, refetching dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useBasket.ts: Manages a localStorage-backed basket of item IDs with add, remove, clear, and lookup utilities.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and hooks for managing Internet Identity auth, including login, logout, and loading stored identities.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines react-query hooks for fetching and mutating backend data such as items, user profiles, admin status, and item updates.
frontend/src/hooks/useStripe.ts: Implements react-query hooks for Stripe config, checkout session creation, and session status retrieval via backend actors.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets up Tailwind and defines light/dark theme CSS variables and base typography styles.
frontend/src/lib/idEncoding.ts: Utility functions to encode and decode Uint8Array IDs using URL‑safe base64.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point initializing React, query client, and Internet Identity provider.
frontend/src/pages/AdminBrandingPage.tsx: Admin interface for editing branding settings, uploading logo/hero media, and saving updates to the backend.
frontend/src/pages/AdminBulkUploadPage.t: Admin tool for bulk image upload with progress tracking, backend verification, and cache invalidation.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPanelPage.tsx: Admin panel page that checks admin and Stripe status and provides controls for configuring payments and branding.
frontend/src/pages/BasketPage.tsx: Displays basket contents, validates item availability, and initiates Stripe checkout for eligible items.
frontend/src/pages/ItemDetailPage.tsx: Shows item details, supports admin editing, basket additions, and direct Stripe checkout with validation.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentFailurePage.ts: Informs the user that payment was cancelled and offers navigation back to the storefront or basket.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentSuccessPage.ts: Confirms successful payment, clears the basket, refreshes item data, and provides navigation back to the storefront.
frontend/src/pages/StorefrontPage.tsx: Loads and displays storefront hero media and a grid of published items, with a loader and empty state handling.
frontend/src/utils/brandingMedia.ts: Validates hero media files, infers content types, and builds MediaKind objects for images and 3D models.
frontend/src/utils/bulkUploadVerificatio: Verifies bulk‑uploaded items by checking existence and accessibility of each item's image via backend and HEAD requests.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Helpers for reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and cleaning them from hash-based routes.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending colors, fonts, animations, and enabling typography, container queries, and animation plugins.
project_state.json: Tracks current project state, features, architecture notes, and known issues for the storefront and admin system.
